definition[0]: principles or standards of good behaviour, especially in matters of sex
example[0]: the morals and customs of the Victorian period
example[1]: Values and morals are independent of religious faith.
example[2]: the corruption of public morals (=the standards of behaviour, especially sexual behaviour, expected by society)
example[3]: a young woman of loose morals (=low standards of sexual behaviour â€“ often used humorously)
